citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The reports of the semi-annual evaluations submitted to the Institutional Official were not updated at least once every six
months after completion of the evaluations. For evaluations conducted in Spring 2022 and Fall 2022, a report was
submitted to the IO on April 24th, 2022 and the next report was submitted on February 1st, 2023. The IACUC shall
prepare reports of semi-annual evaluations in accordance with this section of the regulations and the reports must be
updated at least once every six months upon completion of the semi-annual evaluations.
To be corrected for all reports submitted to the Institutional Official after April 5th, 2023.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
In August 2022, all active protocols at this facility were submitted to the IACUC for review. The principal investigators on
the protocols were not notified in writing of the decision to approve the proposed activities related to the care and use of
animals. The IACUC shall notify principal investigators in writing of its decision to approve or withhold approval of
proposed activities related to the care and use of animals.
To be corrected by April 19th, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The reports of the semi-annual evaluations submitted to the Institutional Official were not updated at least once every six 
months after completion of the evaluations. For evaluations conducted in Spring 2022 and Fall 2022, a report was 
submitted to the IO on April 24th, 2022 and the next report was submitted on February 1st, 2023. The IACUC shall 
prepare reports of semi-annual evaluations in accordance with this section of the regulations and the reports must be 
updated at least once every six months upon completion of the semi-annual evaluations.  
To be corrected for all reports submitted to the Institutional Official after April 5th, 2023. 
2.31(d)(4) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
In August 2022, all active protocols at this facility were submitted to the IACUC for review. The principal investigators on 
the protocols were not notified in writing of the decision to approve the proposed activities related to the care and use of 
animals. The IACUC shall notify principal investigators in writing of its decision to approve or withhold approval of 
proposed activities related to the care and use of animals. 
To be corrected by April 19th, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

n
